ing: 1 (15 ounce) can white beans, drained and rinsed
des: "I like to make these beans after a night of...indulging. They're subtle yet substantive -- a great way to start your day."
ins: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Stir in beans, and toss to coat. Season with sage, thyme, pepper, and salt. Cook 5 minutes, or until beans are slightly crisp.
